00038 #ifndef __BLI_MEMARENA_H__
00039 #define __BLI_MEMARENA_H__
00040 
00041 #ifdef __cplusplus
00042 extern "C" {
00043 #endif
00044 
00045     /* A reasonable standard buffer size, big
00046      * enough to not cause much internal fragmentation, 
00047      * small enough not to waste resources
00048      */
00049 #define BLI_MEMARENA_STD_BUFSIZE    (1<<14)
00050 
00051 struct MemArena;
00052 typedef struct MemArena MemArena;
00053 
00054 
00055 struct MemArena*    BLI_memarena_new    (int bufsize, const char *name);
00056 void                BLI_memarena_free   (struct MemArena *ma);
00057 
00058 void                BLI_memarena_use_malloc (struct MemArena *ma);
00059 void                BLI_memarena_use_calloc (struct MemArena *ma);
00060 
00061 void                BLI_memarena_use_align(struct MemArena *ma, int align);
00062 
00063 void*               BLI_memarena_alloc  (struct MemArena *ma, int size);
00064 
00065 #ifdef __cplusplus
00066 }
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 
00070 #endif
